data.name: Lionel the Dragon
data.detailed_description:
“Lionel the Dragon” - A dark and Moody 2.5D, story-driven action puzzle game based on a child with a worrying view of the world. Touching on issues of mental health and how everyone’s view of the same picture is never the same, in Lionel’s world the shops are empty, there are no people around that he can see, and he just wants his parents to come and get him. But if they do not, he doesn’t care because they are horrible to him, and he stopped loving them a long time ago after they disappeared for the last time. In fact, he is glad they are not around because he has HATED them since he first saw them.

Key gameplay features include Platforming and puzzle-solving in the cerebral world of Lionel the Dragon.
